description: The Rotaract Club of Trento was founded on July 8, 1985, sponsored by the Rotary Club of Trento and part of District 2060. At a time when Rotaract was establishing itself in Italy as a meeting and training space for young students and professionals, the Trentino club immediately stood out for its enthusiasm, friendship, and enthusiasm. The first charity events and social activities marked the beginning of a tradition combining commitment and conviviality, while relationships with clubs such as Regensburg, Rovereto, and Bolzano reflected a natural international outreach.
descCollab: Our close collaboration with Rotary Clubs allows us to participate in projects of national and international importance in the social, healthcare, educational, and environmental fields. The Rotaract Club of Trento was founded and grows with the support of its sponsoring clubs, Rotary Club Trento and Rotary Club Trentino Nord. We also collaborate with the Rotary Club Valsugana and the Inner Wheel Trento and Trento Castello clubs, jointly implementing service, training, and solidarity initiatives, in synergy with local organizations to promote a positive impact on the community.
serviceDesc: Rotaract is a training ground for personal growth, service, and friendship: each member uses their skills to improve themselves and the community around them.
fiveWays: The work of the Rotaract Club of Trento is based on Rotary's Five Avenues of Service, which have guided all our initiatives for over forty years.
way1Desc: We nurture club life through training, friendship, and team spirit, keeping our history alive and encouraging the transfer of values ​​among members of different generations.
way2Desc: We promote the personal and professional growth of our members. Among our projects, “Who Prepares Who”, developed with the Rotary Club of Trento, explored the relationship between schools, universities, and businesses, offering concrete insights for career guidance for young people in Trentino.
way3Desc: We are active in solidarity initiatives supporting Trentino associations, providing a presence and listening ear to those most in need, as well as identifying sectors we can enhance.
way4Desc: The Rotaract spirit pushes us beyond borders with projects such as “United for Ukraine” where we have supported war refugees, strengthening the network of international cooperation and solidarity.
way5Desc: We look to the future with educational projects including the “Newborn's Day” together with the “Friends of Neonatology of Trento”, the Neonatology Department of Santa Chiara Hospital, and the “Trentino Youth Diabetes” Association, promoting a culture of caring.
